casebody.data:
GIANT FOOD STORES, LLC, Respondent
v.
PENN TOWNSHIP, Petitioner No. 549 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 6, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 6th day of February, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.

The Application for Leave to File Amicus Curiae Brief Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED.
